fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Attack a player, dealing a powerful attack to them and collecting 1 use of their ability if they die.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- You start with a 1 time use ability from 3 different roles.
- Anytime anyone visits you, you lose one of your one use abilities, and they become marked.
- If you attack a marked target, nothing can stop the target from dying, and you get your ability back.
- You may multitask your kill with one other ability.
- __**Part of the Daily Streak Faction**__

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Kill all who threaten your loot hoard.
